data.Title: Google Search Updates and Features
data.Description: Google has been busy with several updates and tests related to search, including new Search Console settings for shipping and return information, potential auto-playing video thumbnails in search results, and confirmation that ads can now appear below organic featured snippets. The company also acknowledged the helpful feedback received on the March 2024 core update and expanded language support for translated search results.

data.Title: Bing Search Engine Developments
data.Description: Bing is testing out new features, including a voting system for search results and the discontinuation of its cashback feature in the Start app.

data.Title: OpenAI's Advancements in AI
data.Description: OpenAI is making strides in AI, reportedly working on a project code-named "Strawberry" to improve AI reasoning capabilities and a five-level system to track progress towards Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). There is also speculation about OpenAI developing its own search product.

data.Title: Amazon Launches AI Shopping Assistant
data.Description: Amazon has officially launched its AI shopping assistant, Rufus, in the Amazon mobile app for all US customers. Rufus is designed to help shoppers with product recommendations and information.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews in Search Results
data.Description: There are conflicting reports about the prevalence of Google's AI overviews in search results, with some sources claiming a decrease to 7% while others observe a consistent 14% presence.

data.Title: Majestic Discontinues Disavow Links Feature
data.Description: Majestic has decided to discontinue its disavow links feature, emphasizing the importance of focusing on positive SEO practices rather than trying to identify and disavow toxic links.

data.Title: COPIED Act Aims to Protect Content from AI Misuse
data.Description: The COPIED Act, a new Senate bill, seeks to protect artists and journalists' content from unauthorized use by AI, addressing concerns about copyright infringement and the creation of deepfakes.

data.Title: Google Ads Updates and Tests
data.Description: Google Ads has rolled out several updates, including a potential default to broad match for search campaigns, a new design, and tests for features like "people also browsed" and carousels with two rows of shopping ad units.

data.Title: JavaScript Rendering and SEO
data.Description: A Search Off the Record podcast episode featuring SEO experts discusses the impact of JavaScript rendering on SEO, covering topics like the cost of rendering and Google's ability to handle JavaScript.

data.Title: Google My Business Updates
data.Description: Google My Business (GMB) has new consumer alert features and businesses are advised to remove unwanted Thumbtack booking links from their profiles.

data.Title: YouTube New Features for Shorts
data.Description: YouTube is rolling out new features for Shorts, including text-to-speech video narration, in-app auto-generated captions, and Minecraft effects.
